Plot: Settler Elizabeth Bonner must cross the frozen wilderness of New York State in the winter of 1794 in a desperate bid to save her husband from being hanged as an American spy, in the exciting sequel to Into the Wilderness.
Characters: Elizabeth Middleton, Nathaniel Bonner, Dan'l Bonner, Hannah Bonner, Runs-from-Bears, Robbie MacLachlan, Angus Moncrieff, Daniel Bonner, Lily Bonner, Curiosity Freeman, Luke Scott Bonner, Jennet Scott, Liam Kirby
